headline: Xylem (XYL) Is Down 9.3% After Cautious 2026 Guidance Despite Record 2025 Results And Dividend Hike
summary: Xylem Inc. recently reported full-year 2025 results showing revenue of US$9.04 billion and net income of US$957 million, alongside an 8% increase in its quarterly dividend to US$0.43 per share. At the same time, management issued cautious 2026 guidance of US$9.1 billion to US$9.2 billion in revenue as it accelerates exits from lower-margin businesses to improve earnings quality. Now we’ll examine how Xylem’s cautious 2026 revenue outlook, despite record 2025 performance, may reshape the...
